Class AbstractTransactionHandler

java.lang.Object
io.micronaut.configuration.jdbi.transaction.AbstractTransactionHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
TransactionHandler
Direct Known Subclasses:
MicronautDataTransactionHandler, SpringTransactionHandler
public abstract class AbstractTransactionHandler extends Object implements TransactionHandler
Base class for using transaction management with Jdbi.

1.4.0
Author:
